title: 21st Century Fox gets upside bet
text:
21st Century Fox gets upside bet By Mike Yamamoto (mike.yamamoto@optionmonster.com) 38 minutes ago ÓÅ± Done 
Traders are looking for Twenty-First Century Fox to rebound by early next year.optionMONSTER's Heat Seeker system shows that 2,500 January 29 calls were bought for $1.26 and 2,500 January 25 puts were sold for $1.16. Volume dwarfed open interest of 170 contracts in the calls, indicating that this is a new positioning.This combination trade cost $0.10 and is highly bullish because a rally would boost the price of the long calls while decreasing the value of the puts that were sold . But the opposite will occur if the stock drops, and the trader will be on the hook to buy shares if they fall below $25 by expiration in mid-January. (See our Education section)This follows put selling in the name on Tuesday and call buying in mid-August.FOXA is up 0.39 percent to $27.06 in midday trading but is down more than 21 percent in the last month. The entertainment company has been slammed with other media stocks, gapping down from above $34 after its last earnings report on Aug. 5. With today's combination trade, total option volume in FOXA is more than 50 percent higher than its full-session average for the last month. More From optionMONSTER
